item.title: Statistical Rethinking Chapter 2 Exercises
item.description: Code 2.3 import numpy as np import scipy.stats as stats import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import pymc3 as pm import arviz as az plt.style.use('dark_background') RANDOM_SEED = 8927 np.random.seed(RANDOM_SEED) # az.style.use("arviz-darkgrid") p_grid = np.linspace(0, 1, num=20) prior = np.ones(20) # :: uniform prior = [0 if p < 0.5 else 1 for p in p_grid] # :: step prior = [np.exp(-5*np.abs(p - 0.5)) for p in p_grid] # :: exp likelihood = stats.
